name: Simple Karate Lesson Quiz | Martial Arts | 10 Questions

questions.text: A front kick if you are right handed is kicked with which foot?
questions.explanation:
Right.

	Although your kick will usually come from the back, with your left foot in front.

questions.text: In karate, a staff is also known as a what?
questions.explanation:
Bo & Bow.

	Although most bo's are about six feet high, they can be fitted to each persons height.

questions.text: A kata was only meant to be a one man exercise?
questions.explanation:
True.

	In karate, the kata was made so that the monks could practice their deadly moves so that onlookers would not know what they were doing. It looked more like a dance to the untrained eye.

questions.text: A sai is the same as a sickle.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The weapon that looks like and really is a sickle, is called a kama.

questions.text: What is the name of the uniform that karate people wear?
questions.explanation:
Gi.

	The traditional color is white. Today however it has become common to wear other colors such as black and red, some are even red, white and blue with stars. In traditional tournaments this is forbidden.

questions.text: Judo is not a form of karate.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It is a form of martial arts, but not a form of karate.

questions.text: True or false, it is a form of respect to bow before and after you leave a karate ring in a tournament?
questions.explanation:
True & T.

	The main element about karate and most, if not all of the martial arts is respect. This is a must.

questions.text: The name of the room or place where you practice karate is called a?
questions.explanation:
Dojo.

	A dojo is anyplace that you learn karate, it can be anyplace from a gym to your bedroom.

questions.text: In traditional karate, the highest belt color one can earn is what color?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	Although some American choose to wear a red belt, this is not a traditional color. Some say it is a master's belt, and others a color of a teacher, but there really is no place for it in traditional karate.In traditional Okinawan karate the color of a 10th Dan's belt is red.

questions.text: True or false, the name of your belt is sensei.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Sensi is the name for teacher.
